record.name: Close All Tasks of Withdrawn Request

rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runAction","actionType":"2","relationType":"","ruleset":"rmTask.set.withdawn.closure.code","action":"close.withdrawn.request.task","filename":"requestTask","actionQueryXml":"<collection logic='and' negative='false'><query><operand><field name='parent.request' caption='Parent Request' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='equals' caption='Equals'/><value type='CurrentRecord' caption='CurrentRecord (request)'><field name='number' caption='Number'/></value></query><query><operand><field name='current.phase' caption='Current Phase' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='neq' caption='Not Equals'/><value type='Value' caption='Value'><![CDATA[Closure]]></value></query><query><operand><field name='current.phase' caption='Current Phase' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='neq' caption='Not Equals'/><value type='Value' caption='Value'><![CDATA[Cancelled]]></value></query></collection>"}
